original_title: SLOVAKIA: Treasures in the Heart of Europe
overview: A country of lush forests and mountains surrounded by blissful countryside, Slovakia is a land rich with historical and cultural treasures. Travel to the center of Europe and explore castles, mountains and unknown treasures in one of Europe's most overlooked travel gems. With host Pat Uskert and Slovak guide Mila Kissova.
title: SLOVAKIA: Treasures in the Heart of Europe
